content:
/>
XIII.i.7.A.1.h
.
RLC Responsibility to Provide Notice of Eligibility Determinations
The RLC informs the claimant of the outcome of a basic eligibility determination made by the RO.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section A - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Home Loan Program
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section A
